ygData.subject: Re: Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: well after doing the messenger quest for the fellow with the shark quest I ended up with a potion called marr s essence.  I have no idea what to do with it.
ygData.messageBody:
well after doing the messenger quest for the fellow
with the shark quest I ended up with a potion called
marr's essence. I have no idea what to do with it.
Theoretically new quests were added in the patch last night.

From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
To: "'eqpaladin@onelist.com'" <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date sent: Tue, 4 May 1999 14:22:00 -0500
Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Quests

> From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
>
> Has anyone completed a quest they were really pleased with? The only
> paladin quest that I tried and/or completed was the one for shark skins. I
> only rec'd a few copper for my reward and a tiny hit for experience. I was
> quite disappointed. I am currently level 14, so it would be nice if I could
> still attempt any of the quests mentioned. Thanks for your input, and I
> don't mind a little humor in the group as long as it doesn't get out of
> hand.
>
> Grod
